name: vImageWhitePoint
desc: A structure that represents a white point according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: init(white_x: Float, white_y: Float)
items.desc: Creates a structure that represents a white point according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var white_x: Float
items.desc: The white point x value according to the CIE 1931 color space.

items.name: var white_y: Float
items.desc: The white point y value according to the CIE 1931 color space.
